naslov: Kuća: Trogir, Čiovo, VILA 124 m2 - EKSKLUZIVNA PRODAJA  PREKRASNE VILE (prodaja)
opis: 1. Prodajemo prekrasnu vilu na Čiovu   od 124m2 na parceli od 724m2, koja je u uhodanom turističkom najmu ali isto tako odlična i za obiteljski život. Opširan opis u nastavku: 3 -sobni apartman 130 m2 na 2. katu, prema jugu, komforno i udobno uređen: dnevni boravak / blagovaona 60 m2 s 1 kaučem i TV-om sa sat. Prijemnikom, klima uređajem. Izlaz na balkon. 1 soba s 1 bračnim krevetom (2 x 80 cm, duljina 200 cm), kupatilo / WC i klima uređaj. Izlaz na balkon. 1 soba s 1 bračnim krevetom (2 x 80 cm, duljina 200 cm), kupatilo / WC, whirlpool, s kutnom kadom i klima uređajem. Otvorena kuhinja (pećnica, perilica za suđe, 4 staklokeramičke ploče s keramičkim pločicama, zamrzivač). Ruj. WC. Balkon 15 m2, balkon 5 m2. Balkonski namještaj. Prekrasan pogled na more. ________________________________________ 4 -sobni apartman 130 m2 na 1. katu, prema jugu: dnevni boravak / blagovaona 20 m2 s TV-om sa sat. Prijemnikom (plosnatim zaslonom), klima uređajem. Izlaz na balkon. 1 soba s 1 bračnim krevetom (160 cm, duljina 200 cm). 1 soba s 1 bračnim krevetom (160 cm, duljina 200 cm). Izlaz na balkon. 1 soba s 1 bračnim krevetom (120 cm, dužine 190 cm). Otvorena kuhinja (pećnica, perilica za suđe, 4 staklokeramičke ploče s keramičkim pločicama, mikrovalna pećnica, zamrzivač). Kupatilo / WC, tuš / WC, whirlpool. Balkon 15 m2, balkon 10 m2. Balkonski namještaj. Prekrasan pogled na more i bazen. Podrum Mali dvosobni stan, 16m2 kuhinja i dnevni boravak, 8 m2 male sobe, 11m2 druga soba, 4 m2 kupaonica, hodnik 3m2 koji uključuje perilicu rublja. Podrum ima pristup 16m2 natkrivenoj terasi i pogledom na more. Vrtna površina cca 600m2 Kuća ima 4 parkirna mjesta, bazen 30m2 vanjski tuš, 15m2 terase s velikim vrtnim kaučem, vanjski roštilj sa stolom za 10 osoba prekrivenih sjenom. Glavna namjena ove kuće bila je turistička djelatnost apartmana, a sama kuća čini veliku dobit i 2017 rezervaciju od 280 dana, 2018 očekuje se još više. Ozbiljni kupci prilikom provjere kuće mogu vidjeti dobitne knjige. 3-room apartment 130 m2 on 2nd floor, south facing position, comfortable and cosy furnishings: living/dining room 60 m2 with 1 sofabed and satellite TV (flat screen), air conditioning. Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 1 double bed (2 x 80 cm, length 200 cm), bath/WC and air conditioning. Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 1 double bed (2 x 80 cm, length 200 cm), bath/WC, whirlpool, with corner bath and air conditioning. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, freezer). Sep. WC. Balcony 15 m2, balcony 5 m2. Balcony furniture. Marvellous view of the sea. ________________________________________ 4-room apartment 130 m2 on 1st floor, south facing position: living/dining room 20 m2 with satellite TV (flat screen), air conditioning. Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 1 double bed (160 cm, length 200 cm). 1 room with 1 double bed (160 cm, length 200 cm). Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 1 double bed (120 cm, length 190 cm). Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, microwave, freezer). Bath/WC, shower/WC, whirlpool. Balcony 15 m2, balcony 10 m2. Balcony furniture. Marvellous view of the sea and the swimming pool. Basement Small two room apartment, 16m2 kitchen and living room, 8 m2 small room, 11m2 second room, 4 m2 bathroom, hallway 3m2 that includes washing machine. Basement have access to 16m2 covered terrace and seaview. Garden area cca 600m2 House have 4 parking spaces, swimming pool 30m2 outside shower, 15m2 terrace with big garden sofa, outside grill with table for 10 people covered with shade. The main purpose of this house was to do apartment tourist business and house itself is making great profit and 2017 booking of 280 days, 20178 expected even more. Serious buyers when checking the house can see the profit books. Other purpose is for family owners because the property itself is providing nice environment with calm surrounding for family living. Agencijska provizija 3%
